website_summaries.verdict: This rooftop tent comes with a lot of little extra features that make it worth the money.
pros: Good ability to ventilate if needed
Includes LED light strip powered by a solar panel
cons: Mattress isn't as substantial as some on other tents

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camping experience
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Fits 2 adults and a kid. 4 inner pockets for storage plus a shoe bag. Comfortable foam pad. Led light works great with a USB battery pack. This model also has two skylights so you can enjoy the night sky from your tent. Easy to mount on the cross bars. Overall a great roof top tent for the money.
customer_reviews.author: mervas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing! Especially for the price. My gf and I took it camping the day after I got it. Together we weight over 300lbs (I’m the big guy) it was super easy to install. The only downside is that I’m short so I had to crawl on my roof top to put the ladder back up. You need to make sure you have the right roof rack or crossbars. I had to purchase some and I drive a 2017 4runner.
customer_reviews.author: Squid

customer_reviews.title: price was excellent compared to similar products of different brand
customer_reviews.text: price was excellent compared to similar products of different brand, good quality seams, super bright LED light, nice shoe bag, the sleeping mat def could use more cushion, but overall excellent product for the money. it's on top of a bed rack in a Tacoma OR short bed.
customer_reviews.author: Abel A.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the tent and in Smittybuilt. Used the tent a few times last summer and realized the ladder broke. Reached out for warranty replacement and had a terrible service experience. As I write this, 8 mo after my initial inquiry, I still have no replacement ladder. I would be cautious to purchase as there is no service to address defects
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A few small issues, but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The tent arrived on time and well packaged. I am pleased overall with my purchase. My only issues with the tent so far are that there are small metal shavings underneath the mattress from drilling the holes and the mattress itself is too hard. Both are easily fixed with a vacuum and a 2" foam mattress topper. I plan on eventually replacing the mattress with a solid piece of 4"-5" foam. The tent is definitely worth it for the price. These issues are just the sacrifice you have to make to save a few hundred dollars. Also, I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the cover and the LED strip was very nice to have at camp.
customer_reviews.author: D.Willis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent and the fact that it’s off the ground. My Jack Russell’s loves being up high. The only drawback is attaching it to the rack on top of my Outback. Took forever to get the bolts on because there wasn’t enough room to use the provided wrench. That doesn’t reflect the tent but wanted to mention because if the distance between the rack and the car top is not higher it can be challenging and cumbersome to attach. Setting it up takes less than 5 minutes. Pull the ladder and it is done.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: We got this last summer. It is allows for all the greatness of tent camping without downsides. I'd recommend getting a 2 inch memory foam pad (Queen size is a perfect fit & improves the night's sleep), a kayak lift for your garage (it will allow 1 person to get the tent on/off you vehicle), and some RV leveling blocks. Other than that, it is super fast to set-up, gets you off the ground, and is very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Best RTT for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price it can't be beat in my opinion. Feels very high quality. Sets up and take down is easy. Very happy. Had my girlfriend, my self and both are dogs in there and it felt 100% solid.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Birdsell

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and couldn’t see spending more for something that’s already good quality. Most complaints are the ladder, you will have to drill extra holes in it to have all the travel you’ll need for your set up but easy enough. The ladder is steady and I haven’t used a telescopic one so I can’t compare but most seem to prefer them so I would suggest smittybilt get with the program and use what most want and improve their sales even more. That being said I would still buy this over more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Very good tent!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the tent. Install wasn't challenging. Setting the tent up and taking it down is really simple. The cover can be a slight pain but that's going to be the case of all tents in this class. Camped through a few heavy storms and not a single drop inside the tent. So far no signs of shoddy construction or early wear and tear. I'm really happy. Especially when I compare the price of other RTTs to what I paid for the Smittybilt.
customer_reviews.author: DRock

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Would Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: We finally got to get the tent out for a camping trip after having it for several months. We couldn't be happier. A well constructed tent made of heavy duty material. My one and only issue is that I wish the sleep padding was a little thicker but it's such a non-issue that it's only barely worth mentioning. The tent comfortably fits my Wife, myself, and our 2 medium sized dogs. It's worth mentioning that I'm also not a small person at 6' 3" / 235lbs and it sleeps me comfortably and I can fully stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Kudzu80

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: Need to return. Assembly is not user friendly. Slide plate jammed. Roof rack bars loose. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bradley

customer_reviews.title: First use survived thunderstorm with no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve only used this Rooftop Tent on one camping trip. I went on a three-night trip to central Florida and on the second day there a heavy thunderstorm rolled through which last for several hours. I had previously followed the manufacturers instructions and ‘seasoned’ the tent by wetting it thoroughly to allowed the material in the seams to shrink and draw up. Well, the tent performed perfectly during the storm. No leaks whatsoever. I’m very happy with this purchase. To me it was the best tent for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tony M.

customer_reviews.title: This tent comes with all the extra things that others charge u for
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you cannot beat this tent..Its easy to set up, however dont believe the hype of " u can set this up in couple minutes"...Honestly to do it rite it takes a few min..The tent has great open ceiling windows and the side window allow more than enough air to circulate..I would suggest adding another layer of bedding for comfort..The led light is a great source of lighting...Its sturdy and easy to set up and break down...you can spend thousands on a RTT but u dint need to..this is the best for the money and my family..We sleep 3 with plenty of room...Smitty built includes everything u could want in a RTT...
customer_reviews.author: ronnie scalf

customer_reviews.title: A must have for camping!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is Amazing I've used it in the rain and windy conditions. The kids love it and it is very spacious. The instructions were easy to follow and for the most part explained everything. In my case the bolts suppiled to mount the tent to my rack were not long enough. so I purchased Hex bolts from home Depot. I posted a picture of them if you run into the same problem. I recommend this tent to anyone looking for a rooftop tent.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: STAY AWAY! No matter what all the videos say, it's not worth the money or the hassles. Wish I had saved my money. So disappointed, discouraged, disgusted. I have written manufacturer several times. I am covered with black and blue marks and cuts on my hands trying to put this up and down. My car roof is all scratched and the cover nearly blew off had I not used 1 of my own cords. BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: love this tent
customer_reviews.text: i have had this tent for over a year and i love it. it is very sturdy. the only complaints i would have is the ladder, and the support rail under that attaches to your rack should be longer as well as better hardware. other then that this is a great product and should last me several more years. i have used about 15-20 times in that period and would recommend it. the bedding is decent but you might want extra cushion.
customer_reviews.author: clarence schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, easy install and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love it! Only complaint is for the company they used to ship it...never called me so I could inspect the product prior to signing for it, didn’t sign any documents either (as it has a small hole in the tent ceiling) other than that it’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL WITH AMAZON WARRANTY/RETURN POLICY
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good tent but the ladder/ connection to the base is junk. I used it maybe theee time and the ladder broke off. I was just outside the return window and Amazon told me I needed to contact smittybilt. I’ve reached out to them multiple times and they do not want to warranty the item. Called amazon back and the guy I spoke with was completely unacceptable telling me “ well I’m telling you to contact smittybilt end of story there’s nothing I’m gonna do about it”. Completely unacceptable for this company. I plan to take this to someone higher at amazon.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Safe & Stable!
customer_reviews.text: Realistically Setups/Folds in about 15/20 minutes Sleeps 2 adults or is about the size of a full mattress, the included mattress pad is to good to sleep on its own but i will defiantly upgrade once it starts showing signs of age. the first night we used it poured really bad. this beast handled the whole 6 hour storm like a champ felt super safe as i did not have to worry about light flooding or the tent flying away from the wind. its a great buy considering you not have to tow anything and the cheapest tear-drop or popup could easily cost double or more than this
customer_reviews.author: J. Barboza

customer_reviews.title: Quality control needs some work
customer_reviews.text: Overall the tent seems great but there were a few issues. The biggest is the mattress was covered with aluminum shavings. This was annoying for me but could have been dangerous as well if children were present. After 20 minutes of clean up I can only hope I got all that in-bedded aluminum out. The other matter was some missing stitching on the tent cover Velcro closer. This one is minor in comparison and should only take a few minutes to sew up. On the plus side the materials used to build the tent are of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Philip VanVeen

customer_reviews.title: Initial Thoughts
customer_reviews.text: Construction quality seems good (makes it obvious it was not built by typical meth head workforce in the US). Well designed. Easy to install. Everything is functional so far. No overnight use yet. Only issues are the difficulty in closing the ladder all the way and putting the cover on it. Installed on top of my P/U truck cap makes it tough to deal with the ladder (last step of full closing) and Velcro strips on the cover. Wondering if the Velcro will hold up to many uses. Will update after I have a few dozen nights in the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this tent, It is really worth every single penny! It is really comfortable, and durable. The only gripe I have about the tent is the ladder itself. The ladder has pre-drilled holes in it for taller racks. I have a mid-height rack and the ladder locks in the shortest spot with the ladder sticking out at at 50 degree angle. Don’t let it discourage you from getting the tent though. You can easily drill holes into the ladder for shorter applications.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great roof top tent
customer_reviews.text: This is my first roof top tent so I can’t compare to others. But it shipped fast. Well designed and easy to get it installed. Great price. Mattress was very comfortable. Easily fits 2 adults with extra space for personal items or a dog.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: First roof top tent. Didn't want something that would break the budget but wanted to be off the great especially in bear country. The tent looks really qaulity and the foam mattress is really nice. We will see how it lasts because I already have 2 trips to Moab this month and will spend about 6 nights in it.
customer_reviews.author: chris goss

customer_reviews.title: 4 or 5 star rating
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased this rooftop tent and so far is really enjoying it. He has been using it somewhat regularly since spring. It's hard to rate something 5 stars when you need to keep an eye on durability over time, But we having nothing negative to say. If my husband and I purchase a rooftop tent we will buy the Smittybuilt as well.
customer_reviews.author: SWSteph

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and Value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: After weeks of reviews and researching for the best value per dollar car top tent offered through the various manufacturers we settled on the Smittybilt Tent. The result: complete satisfaction! This is our first car top tent and we were actually more impressed than set out to be due to the wide range/ gamut of pricing ($ 750.00 to $ 4500.00). Plenty of room for 2 people and some gear, easy to set up and put away. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: great RTT for the price! installation will be a pain if you don’t have a ratcheting socket set or wrench only used 3 times so far but we’ve had only great nights of sleep since we augmented it with a memory foam mattress topper we haven’t experienced any defects other than a couple loose threads which i super glued and have not been a problem I highly recommend putting in some sort of motion sensor light near the ladder on the bottom of the base of the tent for added security and safety when going to the bathroom at night
customer_reviews.author: jeffnel

customer_reviews.title: Great RTT for the price
customer_reviews.text: At half the cost of many of it's competitors, this tent is a steal of the deal. It's fairly easy to put together, the hardest part was bolting it to the roof, there's not a lot of clearance on my rack so it's hard to get your hand in there to turn the bolts. But like I said, it's awesome. It fits myself, my boyfriend and our 100 pound dog more than comfortably. And the fact that it sets up so fast and easy, it's great for people like us who will just randomly take off for an outdoor adventure and don't know where we'll end up. Totally recommend if you're looking for a rooftop tent on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: mcrump

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: When we opened up our tent we found it was very dirty and full of metal shavings. We had to vacuum it out and we wiped it all out with a bleach/water mix in a spray bottle. Other than that, it has been great. Easy to set up and looks well built.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ramm

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: For the price this tent is worth every penny. Cheaper than a cvt. The YouTube reviews show years of use with no problems. The fabric feels like a waterproof nylon jacket would feel like. The mat inside is stiff. Some complain about touching the floor when on your side never noticed that.
customer_reviews.author: Cade N.

customer_reviews.title: Smittybuilt Camping
customer_reviews.text: I camped from Texas to Key West and back. All kinds of weather and conditions and the tent held up beautifully. Lots of people interested in it also. Little extra padding to sleep on goes a long way but also slept fine without it. Not for everyone with the climbing in and out but I'm 54 and managed fine. My up and down time on the tent took me a little longer than most reviews on it, but my subie is lifted also. For me it was about 20 to 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebuttle

customer_reviews.title: Get it, love it, and camp national Forrest style!
customer_reviews.text: 10 minutes up 10 minutes down! Fits us and our 80 pound Rhodesian perfectly! Rain fly protects us. On clear nights the two big screen windows on top allow us to see the stars. I put this on my truck combined with Yakima overhaul hd bed rack and couldn't ask for a better camping experience!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tent last summer and my wife, my son (3 year old), and I fit in it just fine. It’s an entry level tent I suppose but it worked flawlessly. Takes a few practice runs to get the set up and tear down dialed in but once you got it, it’s cake. Recommended if you’re just getting into these kinds of tents.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: One GREAT tent! It really held steady in winds of up to 45MPH on a recent beach camping trip. Better than I could have imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Eskie

customer_reviews.title: A solid budget rooftop tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent has been a good buy. I've spent around 20 nights in the tent. I've hauled it across Texas on a 12 hour drive into the Davis Mountains. Then to New Mexico in Carlsbad and Santa Fe. Then to Colorado through several forest trails and the famous Alpine loop. I drove through rain, ice, snow, and multiple mountain passes. Tent held up great. It does get quite a bit of condensation inside at night in cold conditions, but is very easy to dry. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome on top of my camper
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence over whether or not a RT-tent is for you: go for it. A good one--like this one certainly is--won't disappoint. ALSO: don't pass it up because you don't want to or can't attach it to either a Jeep or to any SUV or other vehicle. It's been great on top of my small camper.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Ladder is a little hard to deal with, but over all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy Quality Outdoor Home when Needed
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product and easy to install and easy to set up. Set up time is about 10-15 min. Sturdy and made with high quality materials. The accessory light and phone charger are an amazing surprise. Wet roomy inside for two. Very sturdy in full set up.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the smittybilt tent
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, all the pieces were there, very impressed with the build quality and materials, not nearly as noticeable on top of the car while driving as i expected.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Cover splits in less than a month on the roof.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this product about 45 days and had it installed less than 30. One trip and the top and side seams are coming apart. Meaning the tent gets soaked. The seller won't respond to requests for a warranty. I'm going to see if american express will.help me out.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Camping Experience Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the coolest thing I've ever invested in. I've slept it in already about 10 times. My fiancé and my pup love camping out and the height of the tent always gives us an amazing view. I can't wait to buy the tent annex for this. Such a cool design.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Andreyo

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great RTT. Quality is very high, very well built. Price doesn’t break the bank. I was able to keep all my bedding with it set down which was nice for setup and takedown. Cover is very thick, no leaks during heavy rain so far. Seams and zippers are very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Potter

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as pricey tents.
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome tent. Materials feel high quality. Good care and proper use should make this last forever. Fits the wife, myself, and corgi dog very comfortably. A little heavy for one person to mouny but can be done. I have a thule tracrac and did have to make my own mount plates and buy longer bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have enjoyed this tent so far. We’ve utilized it about 4 times now. Perks: It is easy to install. I would like to say it takes about five minutes to put together and put away. Practice does make us better. On one of our trips it rained and the tent held up well. No signs of water inside entry. As to the durability, only time will tell. So far, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: very well made.
customer_reviews.text: amazing tent. Great quality for the price will last many years if taken care of. Snow proof, thunderstorm proof, and basically dust storm proof. (Believe me I know after my trips out west) Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing easy install camp any place you like
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: We put this on top of our boondocking trailer that goes with our jeep. So easy to set up. Light bar inside for night. Pad is pretty comfortable. Looks great and absolutely no leaks. Best tent I've slept in.
customer_reviews.author: meandmyreddog

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, cool accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, cool accessories, lightweight and for the price you pay you get every pennies worth. Had it out in a thunderstorm this weekend and it held up great
customer_reviews.author: Venture77

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the tent today and install took me about 2 hours for the install. I did need another person to get it on the rack but everything is fairly easy. Seems like good quality, very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck!
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best tents for the price! I have used it a couple times so far and it totally changed me and my wife's camping experience. The only small complaint I'd have is how thin the mattress is but that gets easily addressed by a foam topper. I'd easily buy this again. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. The first night we used it was in a crazy rain storm and we stayed warm and dry. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: A great tent. It's comfortable, waterproof, and sturdy. I installed it myself without much trouble, it would be much easier with a second person though. I only gave it four stars because one of the bottom panels got dented in shipping. Nothing major or structural but it wasn't a cheap tent and now it has a dent.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Peace

customer_reviews.title: love the tent but caution
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent, HOWEVER BE VERY CAREFUL WITH THE LADDER I ALMOST MASHED THE END OF MY FINGER OFF.
customer_reviews.author: DEBIDECOR

customer_reviews.title: I've used it twice and I've loved it. I slept comfortably through a stormy night ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice and I've loved it. I slept comfortably through a stormy night with no issues. Pros: - Lightweight (relatively) - Lot's of flaps for airflow and mesh screens to keep bugs out - Nice construction - Reasonably priced - Great features Cons: - Customer service is lacking - Replacement parts are expensive (I needed a replacement mounting plate for one of 4 mounting points for the roof rack and a simple 4 inch steel plate was like $25 + Shipping) - Velcro straps fray easily - Ladder is too long for use on anything shorter than a roof rack.
customer_reviews.author: James F Staud

customer_reviews.title: UTV Tent
customer_reviews.text: This is our second rooftop tent. They are really well built, and easy to install. Tons of mounting options. Pad could be a bit thicker, but nothing that a thick blanket, or sleeping bag won't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Easiest travel camper / camping tent
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight installs in about 2 hours & durable design .. . Absolutely love it.. I think the best tent I've ever had !!!!
customer_reviews.author: michael griswold

customer_reviews.title: Nice once done💛
customer_reviews.text: Trying to read the instructions on how to put it together had it a month working on it
customer_reviews.author: Owen Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tent, it's a permanent fixture on my Jeep Rubicon!
customer_reviews.author: Ionselat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t leak
customer_reviews.text: Really like the tent. Only drawback to rtt is you have to break down to make fun to anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Mike V.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS TENT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I went camping with a group everyone else had ground tents. They all found Ticks on them... LIKE ALOT OF THEM! I did not find any. So that is one example of reasons I love this tent.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Had to move mounting rails in one inch to accommodate my mini
customer_reviews.author: Patrick m ford

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product. High quality for the money. I am absolutely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Obscura-01

customer_reviews.title: this thing is awesome. im out every weekend
customer_reviews.text: zero buyers remorse. this thing is awesome. im out every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for the price. Easy install. Fits 2 adults with a little space for a bag or two.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More affordable than most other brands and just as solid.
customer_reviews.text: This roof top tent held up perfectly in a full blown thunderstorm with 30 mph wind and driving rain. Stayed warm and dry. Remained very sturdy as well. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent at a great value
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, looked around for a long time for 1. Glad I picked this up. Haven't had any issues. Only thing I suggest, is adding a foam topper to the mattress in the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want for the price
customer_reviews.text: Delivery by Ltl driver was great helped inspect it for damage Some instructions were kind of vague but overall set up was easy Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: angie baker

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price I am very impressed. I appreciate the small accessories included with the kit, totally unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: mike meadows

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with my tent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good quality. I'm really happy with the cover. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: We all love this tent off the ground and on top of a Kia Soul.
customer_reviews.text: Fits on my 2019 Kia Soul Base great. easy to set up and sleeps two adults and a child and a dog. Lot of air movement in the summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! You May need the ladder extension if mounting on top of a full size truck
customer_reviews.author: Josh Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Jeep Wrangler accessory for outdoor adventure.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Easy to open. Easy to close. A warm spacious camper anywhere the Wrangler goes.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: I dont need a ladder extension!! I need the ladder.
customer_reviews.text: can not find replacement ladder!! Ladder is poorly made. would be satisfied if I could replace ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Built on flat deck trailer
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent.i ended up bolting it to my toy trailer on a home made rack. It works absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Josh A.

customer_reviews.title: Best tent I have ever bought!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up alone or with help. My wife and I are enjoying it. Looking forward to many more great adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Was also able to fit two adult humans comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: The Dood told me to give it 5 stars. Was also able to fit two adult humans comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Quality seems comparable to higher end tents.
customer_reviews.author: Rob 21XXX

customer_reviews.title: easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This tent changes camping forever, easy set up, comfy, and Def a unique setup. It is heavy tho and u need help getting it off and on the vehicle. I attached some pics for some assistance with taking the tent on and off the roof by yourself
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: New home
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to getting out well boult like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Erling J Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Totally Bummed!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally screwed up my holiday weekend! Be sure to check before you accept item! I saw by the packaging it was not going to be a Great holiday weekend, was looking forward to a great camping weekend!
customer_reviews.author: John Mrozinski

customer_reviews.title: Good gear for less than other similar products.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for a short time but I have tried it out a couple of times in the mountains near my home in the Southern Rockies. It performed very well and I really like this set up when you are camping with your vehicle. It makes things a little safer and comfortable and it takes up very little time to set up and take down. Quality seems good and after years of using lots of different types of tents in many different environments I think this one will hold up fine . I will post any failures or draw backs as they arise.
customer_reviews.author: Lobo

customer_reviews.title: Don't think about it, Do it!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing, I love everything about it. Functions great, looks great and super easy to use. Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent. Heavier duty than what I first thought
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent. Heavier duty than what I first thought. Very thick material. Wish it had the changing room like others have.
customer_reviews.author: Br_Supertramp

customer_reviews.title: ... able to use it a couple times but I like it. Now
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been able to use it a couple times but I like it. Now, looking for a small trailer to take my kayak along too. The mattress is very comfortable and the tent sets up quickly. Take along a step stool so you can reach all around the front to take off and put on the cover. It fits my Jeep Renegade well, but you can't put the ladder off the back because the hatch won't open. Two people are comfortable in it and I like the pockets, loops for lanterns, boot pouch, and overall roomy feeling. I don't think you can beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bob

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great tent.
customer_reviews.text: A few of the holes are not quite right, I will have to drill them out. Otherwise great tent.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love it. What attention it draws and extremely functional
customer_reviews.text: Love it. What attention it draws and extremely functional. Well made although I did put some carpet scraps on the corners before putting the transport cover on or the square tubing corners surely would have cut through it in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Erik R. Rhyne

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable priced, simple to set up and, while ...
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable priced, simple to set up and, while I haven't used it long enough to know how it will wear long term, it seems well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Clean inside before using .
customer_reviews.text: Showed up full off aluminum shavings from factory drilling holes in aluminum channel .
customer_reviews.author: timothy c.

customer_reviews.title: Great RTT for under $1000.
customer_reviews.text: Great RTT. Many all the features of the higher priced tents plus additional features. Mattress is good but could be a bit thicker for side sleepers. Not all holes were drilled but that was a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: David Darling

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAID
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a good deal, i recomend anyone who buys it to take care of it. After several uses the foam gets thinner and it is noticeable when it is closed that looks inclined. I still love it, the first night i used it i slept on rain with no issue
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My tent didn’t come with the metal poles that hold the awnings up.
customer_reviews.author: c. humphrey

customer_reviews.title: the tent works great, the ladder is a little clunky though
customer_reviews.text: the tent works great, the ladder is a little clunky though. the could use beefing up and the locking system is lacking. overall, i would recommend this product, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gage

product_meta.title: Smittybilt Overlander Tent
product_meta.description: Jeep Wrangler 2007 2008 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 07 08 09 10 11 12 13 14 S/B2783 The perfect camping solution for JK Wrangler owners! Smittybilt Overlander tents are constructed from heavy-duty rip-stop polyester-waterproof and polyurethane-impregnated on top for the ultimate in durability. They include anodized aluminum tent poles, along with stainless steel hinges ideal materials for whatever weather you encounter. The aluminum telescoping ladder extends up to 6 1/2 ft. and may require an optional ladder extension for lifted Jeep Wranglers (sold separately). Overlander tents easily attach to Smittybilt's SRC Overhead Rack (sold separately) and include a 2 in. thick high-density foam 90 in. x 53 in. mattress with removable cover, waterproof rainfly, and mosquito screen. What really makes them unique is the included LED strip light. Overlander Tent, Tan, Polyester, Jeep, Wrangler, Each
feature_bullets: Standard size tent (sleeps 2-3) with high-density 92" x 55" foam double/full mattress and 661 lb. max load
600D heavy-duty waterproof top and rain fly; sunroof; side windows with mosquito netting; anodized aluminum tent frame poles; telescopic ladder; interior LED strips and many more features
Easy to set up and take down; heavy duty PVC cover keeps tent dry and free from UV rays when not in use
Smittybilt Tent Annex (sold separately #2788) with removeable floor can be attached with heavy duty zippers for privacy
Tent also available in Size XL (sleeps 3-4 #2773). Ladder extension also available (#2785).Ladder capacity:265 lbs
